titleInfo.title: Clay Hart and Sally Flynn at the Kenosha Co. Fair

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing Clay Hart and Sally Flynn Show at the Kenosha Co. Fair on August 10. Poster features a metal photoplate of Clay Hart. Poster was printed for job no. 16346. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/21152.
